entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 late this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022
